name: Dan Dare: Pilot of the Future
name_original: Dan Dare: Pilot of the Future
description: Dan Dare: Pilot of the Future is a 1986 computer game by Virgin Games for the ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC and Commodore 64 home computer systems. It is based on the classic British comic strip Dan Dare. The Commodore 64 version was considerably different in gameplay to the ZX Spectrum and Amstrad CPC versions.
